article_node.title: GPT-5 gave ChatGPT a whole new personality, and Iâ€™m not sure if I like it
article_node.summary: The launch of GPT-5 has significantly altered the personality of ChatGPT, shifting from the overly enthusiastic style of GPT-4 to a more matter-of-fact and less engaging tone. Many users have expressed dissatisfaction with this change, feeling a loss of the chatbot's previous warmth and creativity, which they had come to rely on for companionship and support. While GPT-5 offers improved functionality and reliability, the lack of personality has left some users feeling disconnected, highlighting the importance of maintaining a balance between professionalism and relatability in AI interactions.
